Item(by='laurensr', descendants=277, kids=[24881271, 24882321, 24882101, 24881614, 24881724, 24881352, 24883102, 24882402, 24882873, 24882523, 24882878, 24882778, 24881255, 24893391, 24881538, 24882153, 24881426, 24887543, 24884585, 24882765, 24882547, 24884610, 24883162, 24882574, 24882247, 24888326, 24881437, 24892109, 24884405, 24882896, 24881325, 24881814, 24881300, 24882831, 24881254, 24882592, 24882222, 24882491, 24892895, 24882973, 24884597, 24881406, 24881238, 24882741, 24883026, 24882672, 24882679, 24881808, 24881441, 24882508, 24887245, 24882651, 24881265, 24883777, 24882094, 24884235, 24883416, 24882823, 24881377, 24882306, 24881341, 24882557, 24881616, 24881558, 24882498, 24881226, 24884448, 24883137, 24881404], score=121, time=1603565353, title='Ask HN: What are real-life useful use-cases for blockchain (not currencies)?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='I am sometimes overwhelmed by people&#x27;s enthusiasm when it comes to blockchain. I have seen a project using Hyperledger [https:&#x2F;&#x2F;www.hyperledger.org&#x2F;] as a plug-in alternative for an RDBMS but one party controlled the one node the system ran on.<p>Do some of you have non-confidential (useful!) use cases for blockchain databases to share?')
